fr.xephi.authme.process.register.executors

Interface RegistrationExecutor<P extends RegistrationParameters>

  • Type Parameters:
    P - the registration parameters type

    public interface RegistrationExecutor<P extends RegistrationParameters>
    Performs the registration action.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      PlayerAuth buildPlayerAuth(P params)
      Constructs the PlayerAuth object to persist into the database.
      void executePostPersistAction(P params)
      Follow-up method called after the player auth could be added into the database.
      boolean isRegistrationAdmitted(P params)
      Returns whether the registration may take place.

    • Method Detail

      • isRegistrationAdmitted

        boolean isRegistrationAdmitted(P params)
        Returns whether the registration may take place. Use this method to execute checks specific to the registration method.

        If this method returns false, it is expected that the executor inform the player about the error within this method call.

        Parameters:
        params - the parameters for the registration
        Returns:
        true if registration may be performed, false otherwise

      • buildPlayerAuth

        PlayerAuth buildPlayerAuth(P params)
        Constructs the PlayerAuth object to persist into the database.
        Parameters:
        params - the parameters for the registration
        Returns:
        the player auth to register in the data source

      • executePostPersistAction

        void executePostPersistAction(P params)
        Follow-up method called after the player auth could be added into the database.
        Parameters:
        params - the parameters for the registration
